text:
C# Developer | VENA | Full-time | TORONTO, CA

Who are we? Check out the awesome work we’re up to at: https://engineering.vena.io

You will be responsible for building the next generation of Vena’s Windows offerings. You value solving complex and interesting problems. At Vena, you will fill that core need by leveraging Excel Interop/VBA, LINQ, lambda functions, JSON-based Web Services, parallelization, and more to create awesome features in conjunction with our back-end server’s in-memory cube, transforming Excel into a data powerhouse.

We can’t wait to hear from you! Apply at: http://bit.ly/29hgbI9
